DOC.brief_summary: To characterize level asthma control patient satisfaction amongst diagnose asthma sufferer currently receive Symbicort Maintenance Reliever Therapy ( SMART ) Malaysia .
DOC.brief_title: Symbicort SMART Satisfaction From Patient Perspective 2009
DOC.criteria: Have prescribe Symbicort SMART ( 1 2 inhalation twice daily ) Dr 's past 3 month Informed consent Symbicort SMART treatment < 3 month Patients require short course oral steroid twice month
